00020 // URI: <scheme>:<scheme-specific-part>
00021 // URL: <scheme>://<user>:<password>@<host>:<port>/<url-path>
00022 
00023 // ------------------------------------------
00024 // Scheme_Name Description
00025 // ------------------------------------------
00026 // ftp         File Transfer Protocol
00027 // http        Hypertext Transfer Protocol
00028 // news        USENET news
00029 // nntp        USENET news using NNTP access
00030 // wais        Wide Area Information Servers
00031 // gopher      The Gopher Protocol
00032 // mailto      Electronic mail address
00033 // telnet      Reference to interactive sessions
00034 // prospero    Prospero Directory Service
00035 // ------------------------------------------
00036 
00037 // URN: "urn:" <NID> ":" <NSS>
00038 // NID specifies the Namespace ID and NSS specifies the Namespace Specific String.
00039 // URN does not resolve to a unique, physical location. URNs serve as persistent resource identifiers.
00040 
00079 #define U_URL_TO_PARAM(url) (url).getUrlData(),(url).getUrlDataLen()
00080 #define U_URL_TO_TRACE(url) (url).getUrlDataLen(),(url).getUrlData()
00081 
00082 class U_EXPORT Url {
00083 public:
00084 
00085         // Check for memory error
00086         U_MEMORY_TEST
00087 
00088         // Allocator e Deallocator
00089         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00090         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00091 
00092         static UString* str_ftp;
00093         static UString* str_smtp;
00094         static UString* str_pop3;
00095         static UString* str_http;
00096         static UString* str_https;
00097 
00102         Url()
00103                 {
00104                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url, "", 0)
00105 
00106                 if (str_ftp == 0) str_allocate();
00107 
00108                 service_end = user_begin = user_end = host_begin = host_end = path_begin = path_end = query = -1;
00109                 }
00110 
00117         Url(const UString& x) : url(x)
00118                 {
00119                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url, "%.*S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x))
00120 
00121                 if (str_ftp == 0) str_allocate();
00122 
00123                 findpos();
00124                 }
00125 
00132         Url(const char* t, uint32_t tlen) : url(t, tlen)
00133                 {
00134                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url, "%S,%u", t, tlen)
00135 
00136                 if (str_ftp == 0) str_allocate();
00137 
00138                 findpos();
00139                 }
00140 
00144         ~Url()
00145                 {
00146                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url)
00147                 }

00149         // ASSEGNAZIONI

00151         void set(const Url& u)
00152                 {
00153                 service_end = u.service_end;
00154                 user_begin  = u.user_begin;
00155                 user_end    = u.user_end;
00156                 host_begin  = u.host_begin;
00157                 host_end    = u.host_end;
00158                 path_begin  = u.path_begin;
00159                 path_end    = u.path_end;
00160                 query       = u.query;
00161                 }
00162 
00163         Url(const Url& u) : url(u.url)
00164                 {
00165                 U_MEMORY_TEST_COPY(u)
00166 
00167                 set(u);
00168                 }
00169 
00170         Url& operator=(const Url& u)
00171                 {
00172                 U_MEMORY_TEST_COPY(u)
00173 
00174                 url = u.url;
00175 
00176                 set(u);
00177 
00178                 return *this;
00179                 }
00180 
00181         void set(const UString& x)
00182                 {
00183                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::set(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x))
00184 
00185                 url = x;
00186 
00187                 findpos();
00188                 }
00189 
00190         UString   get() const { return url; }
00191         bool    empty() const { return url.empty(); }
00192 
00193         const char* getUrlData() const    { return url.data(); }
00194         uint32_t    getUrlDataLen() const { return url.size(); }

00205         bool isHTTP()
00206                 {
00207                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isHTTP()")
00208 
00209                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(str_http)
00210 
00211                 bool result = (getService() == *str_http);
00212 
00213                 U_RETURN(result);
00214                 }
00215 
00216         bool isHTTPS()
00217                 {
00218                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isHTTPS()")
00219 
00220                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(str_https)
00221 
00222                 bool result = (getService() == *str_https);
00223 
00224                 U_RETURN(result);
00225                 }

00233         void setService(const char* service, uint32_t n);
00234 
00243         UString getUser();

00250         bool setUser(const char* user, uint32_t n);
00251 
00255         void eraseUser()
00256                 {
00257                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::eraseUser()")
00258 
00259                 if (user_begin < user_end)
00260                         {
00261                         (void) url.erase(user_begin, user_end + 1);
00262 
00263                         findpos();
00264                         }
00265                 }
00266 
00272         bool isLocalFile()
00273                 {
00274                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isLocalFile()")
00275 
00276                 bool result = (host_begin < host_end ? true : false); // Is there a host ?
00277 
00278                 U_RETURN(result);
00279                 }

00354         bool isQuery()
00355                 {
00356                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isQuery()")
00357 
00358                 bool result = (path_end < (int)(url.size() - 1));
00359 
00360                 U_RETURN(result);
00361                 }
00362 
00370         UString getQuery();
00371

00379 
00383         void eraseQuery()
00384                 {
00385                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::eraseQuery()")
00386 
00387                 if (path_end < (int)url.size())
00388                         {
00389                         (void) url.erase(path_end);
00390 
00391                         query = path_end;
00392                         }
00393                 }

00455         static void encode(const char* input, uint32_t len, UString& buffer, const char* extra_enc_chars = 0)
00456                 {
00457                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::encode(%.*S,%u,%p,%S)", len, input, len, &buffer, extra_enc_chars)
00458 
00459                 buffer.size_adjust(u_url_encode((const unsigned char*)input, len, (unsigned char*)buffer.data(), extra_enc_chars));
00460 
00461                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("buffer.size() = %u", buffer.size())
00462                 }
00463 
00464         static void encode(const UString& input, UString& buffer, const char* extra_enc_chars = 0)
00465                 { encode(input.data(), input.size(), buffer, extra_enc_chars); }
00466 
00473         static void decode(const char* input, uint32_t len, UString& buffer, bool no_line_break = false)
00474                 {
00475                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::decode(%.*S,%u,%p,%b)", len, input, len, &buffer, no_line_break)
00476 
00477                 buffer.size_adjust(u_url_decode((const unsigned char*)input, len, (unsigned char*)buffer.data(), no_line_break));
00478 
00479                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("buffer.size() = %u", buffer.size())
00480                 }
00481 
00482         static void decode(const UString& input, UString& buffer, bool no_line_break = false)
00483                 { decode(U_STRING_TO_PARAM(input), buffer, no_line_break); }

00499         UString url;      // Content string - not first for object dump...
00500         int service_end,  // End position of the service.
00501                  user_begin,   // begin position of the user.
00502                  user_end,     // end position of the user.
00503                  host_begin,   // begin position of the host.
00504                  host_end,     // end position of the host.
00505                  path_begin,   // begin position of the path.
00506                  path_end,     // end position of the path.
00507                  query;        // start position of the last readed query entry.
